mapper.insert: insert into GAMEINFORMATION(game_no,leagueName,homename,homescore,homeimage,awayname,awayscore, awayimage,round, stadium,matchdate,homewin,awaywin,season, matchtime, gamestatus) values((select nvl(max(game_no),0)+1 as game_no from GAMEINFORMATION), #{g_leagueName},#{homename}, #{homescore},#{homeimage},#{awayname}, #{awayscore}, #{awayimage}, #{round}, #{stadium}, #{matchdate}, #{homewin}, #{awaywin},#{g_season}, #{matchtime}, #{gamestatus})
mapper.delete: delete from GAMEINFORMATION where season = #{g_season} AND leagueName = #{g_leagueName}
